message.content:
cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.SI, cs.NI, cs.CC. 

The paper deals with the construction of regenerating codes, which is a topic in information theory (cs.IT). The construction involves a layered structure with coupling across layers, which is a common technique in distributed systems (cs.DS). The paper also discusses the use of vector binary MDS codes, which is a topic in coding theory and algebraic geometry (cs.SI). The construction is designed to handle node repair, which is a topic in networked systems (cs.NI). Finally, the paper discusses the use of a scalar MDS code as a building block, which is a topic in coding theory and error-correcting codes (cs.CC).
